summary: THE CONSUMER PURCHASED THE VEHICLE ON 4/22/03 AND DROVE IT FOR 3 DAYS.  WHILE DRIVING, THERE WAS A POPPING NOISE IN THE STEERING .  THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE BACK TO THE DEALER ON 4/25/03 AND WAS TOLD BY THE DEALER THEY COULD NOT TAKE A LOOK AT THE VEHICLE THAT DAY, BUT TO BRING IT BACK ON 4/28/03.  HE TOOK IT BACK TODAY, AND THE DEALER STATED THE POPPING NOISE THE CONSUMER HEARD WAS THE STEERING GEAR BOX WHICH HAD FAILED, AND THE COST FOR REPLACEMENT WAS BETWEEN $700.00 - $1000.00.            *JB
